Literacy Night is tomorrow, May 14th from 5:30-7:00 PM!

Bring a blanket and some of your favorite books and join us tomorrow night for our PES Literacy Night. Find a cozy spot in the music room and set up your family reading area. Enjoy some time together with your favorite books. Tickets can be earned if your family is “caught reading”!

Participate in all of the different activities to earn more tickets for the raffle prizes at the end of the night! We will have Guest Readers, Scholastic Book Fair, literacy games, E+R=O activities, Humphrey Activities, a Selfie Photo area, Jungle Terry, face painting, and a popcorn/water snack station. Student published books will be hanging up outside of your child’s classroom too!

We look forward to spending a fun evening with our school families!
